TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MessageHeaderArrayAttribute extends System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class MessageHeaderArrayAttribute Inherits MessageHeaderAttribute

summary.span: 指定在 SOAP 消息中，默认包装元素不能写在标头元素的数组类型旁。

span.span: Specifies that the default wrapper element in the SOAP message must not be written around array types in a header element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您想要在不使用数组类型的默认包装元素的情况下，发出直接包含在 中或包含在 `` 中的第一个或唯一子项下的极大数量的相同元素时，请使用 `` 属性关闭标准数组包装元素。Use the attribute to turn off the standard array wrapper element when you want to emit an unbounded number of identical elements either inside the `` directly or inside the first and only child of `` without the default wrapper element for array types. 仅能应用于数组类型的成员。 can be applied only to members of an array type. 如果已指定， 和 将用作每个数组项元素的名称和命名空间。If specified, the and are used as the name and namespace of the element of each array item. 如果未指定，数组项元素将使用与非重复正文部分相同的命名约定进行命名。If not specified, the array item elements are named using the same convention used for naming non-repeating body parts. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and . 有关在不修改默认 SOAP 信封本身的情况下控制 SOAP 正文内容的序列化的信息，请参阅，[指定服务协定中的数据传输](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md)，和[使用数据协定](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For information about controlling the serialization of the contents of a SOAP body without modifying the default SOAP envelope itself, see , [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md), and [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). 有关创建消息协定的详细信息，请参阅[使用消息协定](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts.md)。For more information about creating message contracts, see [Using Message Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于希望在 SOAP 消息头中包括极大数量的数组项时取消默认的数组包装元素。Use to suppress the default array wrapper element when you want to include unbounded array items in a SOAP message header.
